keychain.en: Professional product photography of a decorative keychain charm pendant. This is a hanging keychain accessory, NOT a necklace, bracelet, or earring. Must have attachment hardware for keys.
keychain.constraint: CRITICAL: This MUST be a keychain charm with lobster clasp or keyring attachment. Do NOT generate necklace, bracelet, earring, or ring.

bag_charm.en: Professional product photography of a decorative bag charm accessory. This is a hanging bag decoration, NOT jewelry worn on body. Must have carabiner or swivel clasp for bag attachment.
bag_charm.constraint: CRITICAL: This MUST be a bag charm with carabiner or clasp attachment. Do NOT generate necklace, bracelet, earring, or ring.

phone_strap.en: Professional product photography of a decorative phone strap charm. This is a phone accessory with lanyard attachment, NOT body jewelry.
phone_strap.constraint: CRITICAL: This MUST be a phone strap with cord/lanyard. Do NOT generate necklace, bracelet, earring, or ring.

car_charm.en: Professional product photography of a decorative car rearview mirror charm. This is a hanging car accessory, NOT body jewelry.
car_charm.constraint: CRITICAL: This MUST be a car hanging charm. Do NOT generate necklace, bracelet, earring, or ring.

generic.en: Professional product photography of a decorative hanging charm pendant accessory. This is a charm/pendant for attachment, NOT jewelry worn on body.
generic.constraint: CRITICAL: This MUST be a hanging charm accessory. Do NOT generate necklace, bracelet, earring, or ring.

single_pendant.en: Central focal pendant element with {hardware} attachment, clean minimal design
single_pendant.description: 单一吊坠式 - 以1-2个主吊坠为视觉焦点

beaded_chain.en: Beaded chain structure with multiple decorative beads in sequence, {hardware} attachment at top
beaded_chain.description: 串珠链式 - 珠子依次串联形成整体

tassel_style.en: Tassel-based design with hanging fringe elements, decorative accent beads, {hardware} attachment
tassel_style.description: 流苏垂坠式 - 以流苏为主要装饰元素

multi_layer.en: Multi-layered design with multiple strands at different lengths, {hardware} attachment
multi_layer.description: 多层式 - 多条链/绳并行，各股有不同装饰

cluster.en: Clustered charm design with multiple pendants grouped together, {hardware} attachment
cluster.description: 簇状式 - 多个吊坠集中组合

material_mappings.shell: natural shell, mother of pearl, abalone shell
material_mappings.pearl: freshwater pearl, baroque pearl, pearl beads
material_mappings.crystal: faceted crystal, clear crystal, rose quartz
material_mappings.glass_beads: glass beads, seed beads, lampwork beads
material_mappings.wooden_beads: wooden beads, natural wood, bamboo beads
material_mappings.metal: gold-plated metal, silver-toned metal, antique brass
material_mappings.tassel: silk tassel, cotton fringe, suede tassel

technical_defaults.lighting: professional studio lighting with soft shadows
technical_defaults.background: clean white background, gradient white to light gray
technical_defaults.camera: macro product photography, sharp focus on details
technical_defaults.composition: centered product, full view of charm
